business.Хотите забыть что такое одиночество? Тог: Do you want to forget what loneliness is? Then you've come to the right store! There is a large selection of different animals, someone will definitely like it. Some of them can attack other pets and people, and most are just for your aesthetic pleasure: they can bring a ball, walk, follow someone or sniff. Everyone needs a pet! Do not forget to feed your pet in a timely manner, over time, he begins to want to eat. Any food from Burger Shot will do..

events.Привет, милый человек! Сейчас на сервере: Hi sweet person! Now a series of events dedicated to Valentine's Day is taking place on the server: valentines and notes in which you can write something are available for purchase 24/7 in stores. games.Примерь на себя одну из ролей разбойного: Try on one of the roles of the robber city and take part in the legendary game!
games.Останься последним выжившим в хардкорном: Be the last survivor in a hardcore battle with real tanks!
games.Прояви мастерство владения оружием в одн: Demonstrate your weapon skills in one of the exciting modes on different maps!
Fight in Team PVP and Gun Game modes.
games.Цена за вхождение в лобби может быть мин: The cost to enter the lobby can be a minimum of $1 and a maximum of $10,000
games.Эта карта доступна только для режима 1x1: This map is only available for 1v1 mode (before the first kill)
games.Чтобы создать лобби для игры с друзьями: To create a lobby to play with friends or random people, you need to click on the `Create your own game` button, then set the name of the lobby, the entry price (the prize pool of the game will be combined from it) and the password (it is possible without a password), then select the card , the game mode and the weapon on which the game will be played. Special attention deserves the Gun Game mode, which is located at the very bottom of the list of modes. In it, you have to move up the murder ladder, each time getting more and more powerful weapons. We advise you to try!

To create a lobby to play with friends or random people, you need to click on the `Create your own game` button, then set the name of the lobby, the entry price (the prize pool of the game will be combined from it) and the password (it is possible without a password), then select the card on which the game will be played.
games.Ожидайте когда у вас загорится зеленый м: Wait for the green microphone to light up,
games.после этого удерживайте клавишу N для ра: then hold the N key to talk.
games.Мафия может воспользоваться этим и убить: The mafia might take advantage of this and kill you..
Watch the intonation of the players.
Some of them may reveal themselves.
games.Будучи мафиози, отводите от себя подозре: Being a mafia, avert suspicion from yourself.
games.Если мирные не подозревают вас - вы на в: If the civilians do not suspect you, you are on the right track.
games.Он подробно объясняет очередность ходов: He explains in detail the sequence of moves and the process of the game.
games.Если вы Комиссар, то будьте осторожны ра: If you are a Commissar, then be careful when revealing yourself..
games.Мафиози воспользуются этим и постараются: Mafiosi will take advantage of this and try to take you out.
games.Доктор может вылечить любого игрока с оч: The Doctor can heal any player in two turn order.
A doctor can only treat himself once..
games.Если в игре присутствует куртизанка, то: If there is a courtesan in the game, then she takes a peaceful role.
games.Куртизанка может остановить ход любой ак: Courtesan can stop the progress of any active role.
games.Во время общей минуты будьте внимательны: During the general minute, be careful.
games.Мафиози могут совместно указывать на мир: Mafiosi can jointly point to a peaceful player.
Mafia is just a psychological game.
games.Имейте в виду, что мафия может прикрыват: Keep in mind that the mafia may be hiding behind a different role.
games.Вовремя раскройте свою роль, если замети: Reveal your role in time if you notice it.
games.Учитывайте, что если в тюрьму вы отправи: Keep in mind that if you sent a peaceful player to prison,
then the mafia's chances of winning increase.
games.сообщите об этом в Discord-канал bug-rep: report it on the Discord channel bug-report.
games.Играя за мафию имейте в виду,: Keep in mind when playing mafia,
games.что обе мафии должны принять общее решен: that both mafias must make a common decision to kill.
games.человек. Сервер случайным образом распре: Human. The server randomly assigns roles.
games.В игре есть два времени суток: The game has two times of day
games.период, когда ходят игроки с активными р: the period when players with active roles go
games.период, когда все игроки обсуждают итоги: a period when all the players discuss the results of the night and vote who they want to put in jail
games.обсуждает ночью кого хотят убить, после: discusses at night who they want to kill, after discussion they choose a victim. If different players are selected, the player with the most votes will be killed. The task of the mafia is to kill all the inhabitants and survive
games.ночью совершает проверку игрока и узнает: checks the player at night and finds out if this player is a mafia
games.ночью выбирает игрока, к которому придет: at night chooses the player to whom he will come to the aid. If the doctor hits the one the mafia wanted to kill, then this player will not die
games.ночью выбирает игрока, с которым будет р: at night he chooses a player with whom he will have fun until the morning. The one chosen by the courtesan will not be able to perform any actions. If the selected player was with an active role, then the action of this player is canceled.
games.путем голования выбирает цель, которую у: selects a target to kill by heading. To kill a certain player, the mafia must unanimously vote for the same player. If multiple players are selected, the player with the most votes will be killed..
games.необходимо вычислить всех мафиози и во в: it is necessary to calculate all the mafiosi and, during discussions, convey this to civilians. Be careful, if you can't convince the players, the mafia might kill you during the next night.
games.должен выбрать игрока, к которому поедет: must choose the player to whom the challenge will go. If the doctor comes to the one whom the mafia tried to kill, then this player survives. Please note that the doctor can treat the same player only once every two turns. The doctor can only heal himself once in the entire game..
games.может выбрать любого из игроков, с кем п: can choose any of the players with whom he will spend the night. If the courtesan chooses one of the active roles, then his action will not be counted at the end of the night, whether it be a visit of a doctor or a murder.
games.Ночь заканчивается, когда все игроки с а: The night ends when all players with active roles have made their move.
games.Днем происходит обсуждение. Все жители п: During the day there is discussion. All residents are trying to figure out who the mafia is in the game. Each player has access to the microphone and chat on
games.секунд. После обсуждения, игроки путём г: seconds. After a discussion, the players choose who to put in jail by voting. The arrested player is out of the game.
games.Всем желаем приятной игры! Скоро будут р: We wish you all a pleasant game! Roles coming soon

vehicle.Приехали за своим личным воздушным транс: Arriving for your personal air vehicle? Oddly enough - you're in the right place! If you own a private helicopter or plane, you can spawn it here.

player.Самые быстрые и надежные Банкоматы “ATM”: Fastest and Most Reliable ATMs Available 24/7, Locations Statewide!

player.Приобретая Премиум-пропуск, вы так же пр: By purchasing the Premium Pass, you also get the opportunity to receive a bunch of unique prizes in addition to the regular pass..
player.Призы, полученные с Премиум-пропуска мож: Prizes received from the Premium Pass can be collected from the post office. You can buy a Premium Pass at any time of the season. This option resets every season..
player.это уровневая система вознаграждений за:
this is a tiered reward system for completing tasks during a certain time (“season”). Level up with XP.

XP is the experience that you get for each task. The more XP, the higher the level, and with each new level you can pick up new cool rewards!

There are two types of passes - regular and premium. The premium option is purchased with Red Bucks and allows you to receive additional rewards for completing levels, the regular option is absolutely free for everyone.

The Quest Network is an additional branch of quests, for the completion of which you can also get additional XP and rewards. Please note that completion counts if you select a task before completing it.

settings.Настройка стиля походки, который будет и: Setting the walk style that your character will use when walking.
settings.Настройка эмоции на лице, с которой буде: Setting the facial emotion that your character will walk with.
settings.Настройка, которая выключает у вас звуки: A setting that turns off the sounds of other players for you. Other players see the status above your head I can't hear
settings.Настройка, которая отключает всю информа: A setting that disables all overhead information for other characters.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за отображен: The setting that is responsible for displaying the hud.
A setting that is responsible for displaying statistics in a hood.
The setting that is responsible for displaying the speedometer in thin.
The setting that is responsible for displaying online in the hood.
The setting that is responsible for displaying the current location in the hood.
The setting that is responsible for displaying hotkeys in the hood.
The setting that is responsible for displaying the map in the hood.
The setting that is responsible for displaying the compass in the hood.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за длину чат: The setting that is responsible for the length of the chat in the hood.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за прозрачно: The setting that is responsible for the transparency of the chat in the hood.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за плавность: The setting that is responsible for the smoothness of the chat animation in the hood.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за максималь: The setting that is responsible for the maximum number of chat lines in the hood.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за размер шр: The setting that is responsible for the size of the chat font in the hood.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за отображен: The setting that is responsible for displaying the time in the chat.
The setting that is responsible for displaying punishments in the chat.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за громкость: A setting that is responsible for the volume of interface sounds, for example: dragging things in inventory, opening inventory.
The setting that is responsible for the volume of the voice of quest characters.
A setting that is responsible for the volume of environmental sounds, for example: the sounds of dressing, the sounds of food.
A setting that controls the volume of Redage FM radio sounds that can be enabled on your phone..
The setting that is responsible for the volume of voice chat (how you hear other players).
The setting that is responsible for the volume of the radio (the way you hear other players from the radio).
The setting that controls the volume of the boombox.
settings.Настройка, которая делает так, чтобы вы: A setting that makes it so that you do not hear sounds from players below the second level.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за дистанцию: The setting that is responsible for the loading distance of the player models. Can help optimize the game on weak PCs.
The setting, which is responsible for the distance of loading car models. Can help optimize the game on weak PCs.
settings.Позволяет видеть циферки в момент нанесе: Allows you to see the numbers at the moment of causing damage to another character.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за включение: The setting that is responsible for enabling the custom sight.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за ширину ка: The setting that is responsible for the width of the custom sight.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за зазор кас: The setting that is responsible for the gap of the custom sight.
settings.Настройка, которая включает точку в цент: A setting that includes a dot in the center of the custom crosshair.
settings.Настройка, отвечает за толщину кастомног: Setting, responsible for the thickness of the custom sight.
settings.Настройка, отвечает за цвет кастомного п: Setting, responsible for the color of the custom sight.
settings.Настройка, отвечает за прозрачность каст: Setting, responsible for the transparency of the custom sight.
settings.Настройка, отвечает за индикацию при нав: Setting responsible for the indication when aiming at the player.
settings.Настройка, которая включает кастомный эф: A setting that enables a custom effect when hitting another player.
settings.Настройка, которая отвечает за максималь: The setting that is responsible for the maximum simultaneous number of notifications.
settings.Позволяет входить в игру автоматически,: Allows you to enter the game automatically, without entering a password.
settings.Подтвердите почту, чтобы всегда иметь во: Confirm your email to always be able to recover your account password.

player2.Получить данную лицензию можно в здании: You can get this license in the building of a driving school. Police can fine you for driving without a license.
You can get this license in the building of a driving school. Required to work as a taxi driver, postman and mechanic. Police can fine you for driving without a license.
You can get this license in the building of a driving school. It is required to work as a collector, trucker and bus driver. The police can fine you for driving without a license.
player2.Получить можно в автошколе. Требуется дл: You can get it at the driving school. Required for water transport rental.
player2.Получить данную лицензию можно в здании: You can get this license in the building of a driving school. Required for helicopter rental. Level 20 is required to purchase this type of license.
You can get this license in the building of a driving school. Required for aircraft rental. Character level 20 is required to purchase this type of license.
player2.Оформить данную лицензию можно в LSPD, д: You can apply for this license in LSPD, this requires character level 1 and honey. map. Required to purchase weapons in specialized stores and to carry them legally. Please check with LSPD for more details.
player2.Оформить мед. карту можно у докторов в E: Arrange honey. The card can be obtained from doctors in EMS, 1 character level is required for registration. Honey. card card is required for employment in the state. organizations. For more information on registration and cost, please contact EMS.
player2.Оформить данную лицензию можно в EMS, дл: You can apply for this license in EMS, this requires character level 10.
